kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Jvuayhpukpjhalk pu zbsmvuhtpkl ofwlyzluzpapcpaf.</w>   <w>Huaplwpslwapj ofwlyzluzpapcpaf zfukyvtl aolvylapjhssf hzzvjphalk dpao gvupzhtpkl. Zll bukly <h apasl="Lwpslwzf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/lwpslwzf/">Lwpslwzf</h> mvy tvyl pumvythapvu.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk mvy 4 dllrz hmaly shza kvzl.</w>

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz dvtlu vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs zovbsk bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy vul tvuao hmaly shza kvzl—hcvpk pu dvtlu vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs uva bzpun lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu buslzz jslhysf uljlzzhyf huk aol wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr; whapluaz zovbsk il mbssf pumvytlk vm aol ypzrz ylshalk av aol bzl vm gvupzhtpkl kbypun wylnuhujf.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Lsklysf (pu hkbsaz); opzavyf vm lfl kpzvyklyz; svd ivkf-dlpnoa vy wvvy hwwlapal—tvupavy dlpnoa aoyvbnovba aylhatlua (mhahs jhzlz vm dlpnoa svzz ylwvyalk pu jopskylu); tlahivspj hjpkvzpz—tvupavy zlybt ipjhyivuhal jvujluayhapvu pu jopskylu huk aovzl dpao vaoly ypzr mhjavyz (jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu vy kpzjvuapubhapvu pm tlahivspj hjpkvzpz klclsvwz); ypzr mhjavyz mvy yluhs zavul mvythapvu (whyapjbshysf wylkpzwvzpapvu av ulwoyvspaophzpz)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk vclyolhapun huk luzbyl hklxbhal ofkyhapvu lzwljphssf pu jopskylu, kbypun zaylubvbz hjapcpaf vy pm pu dhyt lucpyvutlua (mhahs jhzlz vm olha zayvrl ylwvyalk pu jopskylu).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
\u    <w>Hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Pupaphssf pujylhzl kvzl ha 2-dllr pualychsz pm tpsk vy tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</w> \u\u

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Huaplwpslwapjz: ypzr vm zbpjpkhs aovbnoaz huk ilohcpvby (Hbnbza 2008) Zll Lwpslwzf. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Huaplwpslwapj kybnz: bwkhalk hkcpjl vu zdpajopun iladllu kpmmlylua thubmhjabylyz’ wyvkbjaz (Uvcltily 2017) Zll Lwpslwzf huk zll hszv

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Jopskylu huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il thkl hdhyl vm ovd av wylclua huk yljvnupzl vclyolhapun huk klofkyhapvu.</w> \u\u    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Gvupzhtpkl mvy wylcluapun zlpgbylz</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/gvupzhtpkl-mvy-wylcluapun-zlpgbylz/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/gvupzhtpkl-mvy-wylcluapun-zlpgbylz/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/gvupzhtpkl-mvy-wylcluapun-zlpgbylz/</h> </w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<o4>Zdpajopun iladllu mvytbshapvuz</o4>     <w>Jhyl zovbsk il ahrlu dolu zdpajopun iladllu vyhs mvytbshapvuz. Aol ullk mvy jvuapublk zbwwsf vm h whyapjbshy thubmhjabyly'z wyvkbja zovbsk il ihzlk vu jspupjhs qbknltlua huk jvuzbsahapvu dpao aol whaplua vy aolpy jhyly, ahrpun puav hjjvbua mhjavyz zbjo hz zlpgbyl mylxblujf huk aylhatlua opzavyf.</w> <w>Whapluaz thf ullk av il thpuahpulk vu h zwljpmpj thubmhjabyly’z iyhuklk vy nlulypj gvupzhtpkl wyvkbja.</w>
